body_content.explanation: a type of palm tree (= a tree that grows in hot countries and has a tall trunk and a mass of leaves growing out of the top) whose leaves form a round shape on each branch:
examples: I sit on the back porch watching squirrels chase one another around the cabbage palm.
Use exotic-looking plants such as cannas, cabbage palms, bamboos, and bananas.
Other plants, such as the cabbage palmetto, protect their growth bud with a sheath of green leaves.
